channel.title: Impossible in MegaMission
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Impossible in MegaMission" - item and cakra bonus

item.title: Re: Impossible in MegaMission
item.content:encoded: Because then a lot more jutsu would be unusable on megamissions. Also I have a feeling McM will be adding some very high cost jutsu eventually.

item.title: Re: Impossible in MegaMission
item.content:encoded:
yup, i know that "rules". that's why i said impossible mean nothing.
but i wonder why the cakra used not 10x too :D

item.title: Re: Impossible in MegaMission
item.content:encoded:
Read the MegaMission text when you turn them on!

You get 11 times the rewards at 10 times the cost. So if you want to use Escape Jutsu, you need 10 smokebombs or in your case, 10 sealed kunai. Since you cant get 10 sealed kunai, you cant use Flying Thunder God Jutsu. And you got the +500 chakra event so you got 5500 chakra, but it only goes up to your max.

item.title: Impossible in MegaMission
item.content:encoded:
when megamission on activated.
did AA general mission.
1. +5500 bonus cakra. ???? how to get that? my max cakra only 2200.
Genjutsu AA-Rank
Outwit a Sicilian When Death is on the Line!
Special Event!
+500 Chakra!

2. Flying God Thunder Jutsu ( automatic win jutsu ).
need 10 items sealed kunai.
10 ????
when there is only 1.

:D

tq
